$ head conn.log | jq -rc '[."id.orig_h",."id.resp_h"] | @tsv'
10.55.182.100	10.233.233.5
192.168.88.2	165.227.88.15
10.55.100.111	165.227.216.194
192.168.88.2	165.227.88.15
10.55.100.111	165.227.216.194
10.55.182.100	192.30.253.112
192.168.88.2	165.227.88.15
192.168.88.2	165.227.88.15
10.55.182.100	10.233.233.5
192.168.88.2	165.227.88.15

$ head conn.log | jq -rc '[."id.orig_h",."id.resp_h"] | @csv'
